definition: to pursue/to chase after/to accelerate/to catch up with/to overtake
to sculpt/to carve/musical instrument (old)
to chase after/to seek/to do one's utmost to seek or procure sth/to recall
to overtake/to catch up with/to hurry/to rush/to try to catch (the bus etc)/to drive (cattle etc) forward/to drive (sb) away/to avail oneself of (an opportunity)/until

sentences.english: The hound picked up the fox's smell and started to chase after it.
sentences.chinese: 猎犬嗅出了狐狸的气味，便开始跟踪追赶。

sentences.english: The law system in modern Asia is a "running after" system by nature.
sentences.chinese: 亚洲现代法治是一种“追赶型”法治。

sentences.english: She was soon out of breath,but she continued to run.
sentences.chinese: 只追了一会儿便上气不接下气了，但她还是继续追赶。

sentences.english: The detective took out after a burglar.
This article reviewed the progress of solid state sources catch up with florescent lamps.
sentences.chinese: 综述近三年来固态光源追赶荧光灯的进展。

sentences.english: THE ORDER -----No looting in shops. No honking and no overtaking on the roads.
sentences.chinese: 商店没出现掠夺，路上也没追赶与尖叫。

sentences.english: It seemed as if the starlings had been hypnotised because they acted as if they were not being chased.
sentences.chinese: 椋鸟看似精神恍惚，因此它们的举动像没人追赶一样。

sentences.english: With the car, if left behind is not the speed chase.
sentences.chinese: 而跟车，万一掉队了也不要超速追赶。

sentences.english: The police car raced through the streets in pursuit of the stolen motorbike.
sentences.chinese: 警车在街上急驰，追赶着那辆被盗的摩托车。

sentences.english: The man came after the boy waving a big stick .
sentences.chinese: 那个男人扬着一根大棒去追赶小男孩。
囚犯摆脱了他的追赶者。

sentences.english: But Father got wind of it, though not quite in time, and was after him as quickly as he could.
sentences.chinese: 但我父亲风闻其事，虽然不太及时，还是尽力地追赶。

sentences.english: Juventus are stepping up their push for Lazio fullback Massimo Oddo.
sentences.chinese: 尤文正在加紧追赶拉奇奥右后卫奥多的步伐。

sentences.english: Harry rode on a horse to purse him.
Brynildsen is also playing catch up following his retirement in Sardinia.
sentences.chinese: 撒丁岛退赛的布吕尼尔森也在扮演者追赶者的角色。

definition: to overtake
to pursue closely
to go forward/to forge ahead/to advance/onward
to chase/to pursue vigorously
to catch up vigorously/to set off in hot pursuit
to pursue and attack
to run
to sculpt/to carve/musical instrument (old)
to chase after/to seek/to do one's utmost to seek or procure sth/to recall
to run neck and neck/to keep pace with/to keep abreast of/on a par with one another
to run away/to flee in disarray
to fall behind/to drop out
to try hard to catch up
to shake off/to get rid of
to dash (run fast)/to rush/to dart
footstep/step
to tail behind/to tag along/to follow on the heels of
